channel.title: Little problem
channel.description:
hey, i've added some items to my server such as Tokhaal-kal
yesterday it was going in the cape slot
and today it is going in the weapon slot, this seems to happen with other items i've added too
anyone know what i can do to fix this? Rep++ will be given :)

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @Primate Primate
item.description:
@Primate wrote:

xneonx:

You can set the item to go in either the head position, right arm, left arm etc. by using datmaker. Just be sure to set the bottom right part of datmaker from “0” to “10” so that it will stick with your character and not be in a fixed position. If you need help just send me a pm because I forgot what it’s called but I could do it in a heartbeat.

ok will try this, thanks

Read full topic

item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

You can set the item to go in either the head position, right arm, left arm etc. by using datmaker. Just be sure to set the bottom right part of datmaker from “0” to “10” so that it will stick with your character and not be in a fixed position. If you need help just send me a pm because I forgot what it’s called but I could do it in a heartbeat.

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @Primate Primate
item.description:
@Primate wrote:

my bad, items are in item.java and models were downloaded so no i didnt use datmaker if i open the models in datmaker can i fix them?

Read full topic

item.title: Little problem
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

First off, wrong section. Second, you did use the datmaker to choose which slot the item went in right? And you should also have added the item id in your item.java or something like that depending on the source.

Read full topic
